content: next 26 30 34 sts across the instep till m2 skip m2 knit 12 15 18 picked up sts gusset decreases r1 knit to 3 sts before m1 k2tog k1 work all stitches across instep to m2 slip m2 k1 ssk and knit to end of round r2 knit all sts continue knitting instep part according to the charts repeat r1-r2 decreases until you again have 48 60 72 stitches take away the markers m1 and m2 ** if the 3 sts that you need to slip to change the color come to the place of the decrease slop them as is and make the decrease next round all the decreases of one side must be done on the stripes of the same color usually on one side on stripes of color a and on another - on color b foot continue to work foot in stockinette changing colors the same way until 2 inches from desired length stop after the full round of color a knit one more round with color a toe shaping work toe with color a preparation part toe prep r1 decrease evenly 0 4 8 sts now you have 48 56 64 sts toe prep r2-6 2-7 2-8 knit all sts © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 5 toe main part size l toe decrease r1 *k6 k2tog* all the way round next 6 rounds knit all sts toe decrease r2 *k5 k2tog* all the way round next 5 rounds knit all sts toe decrease r3 *k4 k2tog* all the way round next 4 rounds knit all sts toe decrease r4 *k3 k2tog* all the way round next 3 rounds knit all sts toe decrease r5 *k2 k2tog* all the way round next 2 rounds knit all sts toe decrease r6 *k1 k2tog* all the way round next 1 round knit all sts toe decrease r7 *k2tog* all the way round cut the yarn leaving 7-8 long tail and pull through remaining sts 2 times tie off size м work the toe the same way as for size l but starting from toe decrease r2 5 sts between decreases size s work the toe the same way as for size l but starting from toe decrease r3 4 sts between decreases weave in ends and wash/block according to your yarn instructions thank you for choosing helix socks pattern ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/anna-zhuravleva you can match your project to the helix socks pattern instagram @annike knit you can share with tag #annike_helix_socks © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 6
